name: Robert Catron
body:
My name is Robert Catron. I'm in my late teen years, and I've started to learn how to program Java. 
I'm hoping to move to c++ or c# relatively soon. 

I usually spend my free time playing video games, or developing plugins for [Bukkit](http://bukkit.org/).

What I really want to do is be a game software developer for either Bethesda or 2K Games.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
